Class XReport

java.lang.Object
app.XReport
public class XReport extends Object
This class holds the information required to generate an X Report for each day in the POS system. It is to be used by manager to analyze store performance.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • XReport

      public XReport(int hour, int numOrders, double totalSales, double avgOrderPrice, double totalTips, int totalDrinks)
      Constructs an X Report object with the specified hourly data.
      Parameters:
      hour - the hour of the day (from 0-23)
      numOrders - the number of orders plaved during the hour
      totalSales - the total sales amount during the hour
      avgOrderPrice - the average order price seen during the hour
      totalTips - the total amount of tips collected during the hour
      totalDrinks - the total number drinks sold during the hour
